subject: Football (College)
College Athletics
Coaches and Managers
Colleges and Universities
lead_paragraph: John R. Silber, Boston University’s longtime president, who died last week, had a theory that was ahead of its time: college football coaches hold too much power.
snippet: John R. Silber, Boston University’s longtime president, who died last week, had a theory that was ahead of its time: college football coaches hold too much power.
